snippet: The New York Times and Siena College asked New York City residents for their assessment of Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio and the outgoing mayor, Michael R. Bloomberg.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times and Siena College asked New York City residents for their assessment of Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio and the outgoing mayor, Michael R. Bloomberg.

headline.seo: New Yorkers on de Blasio and Bloomberg
headline.main: New Yorkers on de Blasio and Bloomberg
